Title: Tape 6, Side B
Writer: Jay Asher (book), Elizabeth Benjamin, Nic Sheff (story editor), Brian Yorkey (creator)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Hannah winds up at a party after an argument with her parents. The students are served with subpoenas, and Justin wrestles with conflicting loyalties.
